attributes.action: Big business should pay the same hourly rate in one county as they do in another
attributes.background: Companies often pay different hourly rates in one county than they do in others, This doesn't create a level playing field across the country as a whole and leads to poverty. It's time those guilty companies took responsibility and are forced to help fund social care, education, housing and health.

rejection.details:
Your petition seems to be calling on companies to take this action.

If you would like the Government or Parliament to take action on this - for example, by requiring companies by law to pay the same rates across the UK - you could start a petition asking for that.
